content: TITLE: Basic Usage of React Pro Sidebar Components DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating the basic usage of Sidebar, Menu, MenuItem, and SubMenu components from the React Pro Sidebar library. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { Sidebar, Menu, MenuItem, SubMenu } from 'react-pro-sidebar'; Pie charts Line charts Documentation Calendar ; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Integrating React Pro Sidebar with React Router DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use the React Pro Sidebar components with React Router for navigation, including custom styling for active menu items. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { Sidebar, Menu, MenuItem } from 'react-pro-sidebar'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; }> Documentation }> Calendar }> E-commerce ; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Advanced Menu Item Styling in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Example showing advanced customization of menu items using the menuItemStyles prop, including conditional styling based on level, active state, and disabled state. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` { // only apply styles on first level elements of the tree if (level === 0) return { color: disabled ? '#f5d9ff' : '#d359ff', backgroundColor: active ? '#eecef9' : undefined, }; }, }} > //... ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Sidebar Styles in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to customize the styles of the Sidebar component using the rootStyles prop and sidebarClasses utility. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` // ... ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SubMenu Component Props in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Props for the SubMenu component including label, icon, open state, and event handlers for submenu behavior. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` string | ReactNode ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ReactNode ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` boolean ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` (open: boolean) => void ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` string | React.ReactElement ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` CSSObject ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: MenuItem Component Props in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Props for the MenuItem component including icon, active state, disabled state, and content decoration options. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ReactNode ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` boolean ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` string | ReactElement ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` CSSObject ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Menu Component Props in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Props available for the Menu component, including closeOnClick, menuItemStyles, and transition options. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` boolean ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` MenuItemStyles ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` (params: { level: number; collapsed: boolean; disabled: boolean; active: boolean; open: boolean; }) => React.ReactNode ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` number ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` CSSObject ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Demonstrating MenuItemStyles Type Definition in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows the type definition for MenuItemStyles which allows for styling MenuItem/SubMenu components and their children. It uses CSSObject or a function that returns CSSObject based on MenuItemStylesParams. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` type ElementStyles = CSSObject | ((params: MenuItemStylesParams) => CSSObject | undefined); interface MenuItemStyles { root?: ElementStyles; button?: ElementStyles; label?: ElementStyles; prefix?: ElementStyles; suffix?: ElementStyles; icon?: ElementStyles; subMenuContent?: ElementStyles; SubMenuExpandIcon?: ElementStyles; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sidebar Component Boolean Props in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Boolean props available for the Sidebar component including defaultCollapsed, collapsed, toggled, and rtl options. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` boolean ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sidebar Component Background Props in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Background-related props for the Sidebar component including backgroundColor and image options. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` string ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sidebar Component Styling Props in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Styling options for the Sidebar component including rootStyles for applying CSS objects. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` CSSObject ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sidebar Component Width Props in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Width-related props for the Sidebar component, which can be specified as numbers or strings. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` number | string ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sidebar Component Breakpoint Props in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Breakpoint options for responsive behavior of the Sidebar, with predefined or custom values. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` xs | sm | md | lg | xl | xxl | all ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sidebar Component Event Handler Props in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Event handler props for the Sidebar, including onBackdropClick callback function. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` () => void ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sidebar Component Transition Duration Prop in React Pro Sidebar DESCRIPTION: Setting transition duration in milliseconds for collapse and toggle animations in the Sidebar. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` number ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing React Pro Sidebar using yarn DESCRIPTION: Command to install the React Pro Sidebar library using yarn package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` yarn add react-pro-sidebar ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing React Pro Sidebar using npm DESCRIPTION: Command to install the React Pro Sidebar library using npm package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/azouaoui-med/react-pro-sidebar/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install react-pro-sidebar ```
